paragraph.paragraph: The EiffelEnvision Eiffel Editor exposes a number of configurable properties, configurable through the use of the Visual Studio .NET vxoriOptions 0 Options Dialog Box . You can access the options pages using Tools, Options menu.

The Eiffel editor has a total of three configuration pages to configure various aspects of the editor and the way it behaves. Please see each section for more information on configuration.
